channel.title: Making your server say "Server restart **:**"
channel.description:
I'm trying to make my server say Server Restart in **:**. It would say something like Server Restart in 12:39, meaning the server will restart in 12 minutes and 39 seconds. I tried coding it myself because I am usally good with words on the screen but the timer was only for one person. If I logged on 12 minutes into the server being up, it would say 30 minutes left. Also it would say 1800 seconds left. I say a tutorial on this somewere but I can't find it.
Also just a hint, I'm looking for a coding team for ZezumaScape2, just a hint.
- Thank you - ~RXVL~
Owner of ZezumaScape 1,2,and 3.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 08:22:58 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help, I know theres someone out there thats knows how to do this.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 08:37:08 PM[/size][hr]Oh come on, fine, I'll up the reward. The person that helps me code this gets admin spot and 1K blue phats. Thats alot on my server, please I'm begging you people for this.

item.title: Making your server say "Server restart **:**"
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

RXVL:

I dont want a command. And I suck at coding most things. I want it to automaticaly start when the server goes up.

Then you can do this:

if (RestartServer > 0) {
RestartServer -= 1; }

I’ll leave you to code the part where it reaches zero and restarts.

Read full topic

item.title: Making your server say "Server restart **:**"
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

I dont want a command. And I suck at coding most things. I want it to automaticaly start when the server goes up.

Read full topic

item.title: Making your server say "Server restart **:**"
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

public static int RestartServer = 30000;

if (RestartServer > 0 && restartCommand == true) { RestartServer -= 1; }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Restart")) { if (RestartServer == false) { RestartServer = true; } }

Then you can add it on the playing screen:
Restarting in “+RestartServer+”

Something like that? It doesn’t goes back to 30000 if someone logs out and back it. It continues counting down.

You can code the rest.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

No thats not what I wanted. I want it so that it starts a univeral countdown from 30:00 to 00:00. Also the countdown cant be so that if you log in 15 minutes and 30 seconds into the time that the server went up, it wont say Server Restart in 30:00, it will say Server Restart in 14:30 and so on, you get the drift.
